item.title: Tips and Tricks With Curl and Jq
item.description: Tips and Tricks With Curl and Jq In this blog post we will work with Restful APIs and use jq, which is a command line processor for json. We will use curl to make Rest calls and then use jq to parse the json response into more useful information. By using jq we can do many useful transformation with json such as aggregating data like averages from a json response payload and extracting only the fields that we are interested in working with instead of an entire payload and much more.
